name: ANS | [GRC/TECH] - Control logging and data restoration
description: The provider must have a procedure governing data restoration. Any restoration operations performed must be logged.
testingInformation: A procedure framing data restoration and its logging has been defined and implemented.
actionPlanInstructions: Define and implement a procedure to perform data restoration, precise how it should be logged.
actionPlanTitle: Procedure defining the data restoration process and its logging not in place.

controlMappingSources.sourceName: Governance risk and compliance | Cloud engineer
